import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, FormGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; export class Contact extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { name: '', email: '', phone: '', message: '' } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this) } handleChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); } handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() this.resetForm() } render() { return ( <>
